title: Is Evenepoel a True Tour de France Contender? ‘It’s Going to Be Tough to Beat Tadej, But We Have to Believe’
content:
Evenepoel faces 'moment of truth' in the Pyrénées after making bulldozing start to his Tour de France debut.

Read the full article at Is Evenepoel a True Tour de France Contender? ‘It’s Going to Be Tough to Beat Tadej, But We Have to Believe’ on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
